entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
